Oelwein, Iowa: 1947



From "A History of UFO Crashes" by Kevin D. Randle: 

Lloyd Bennett claimed to have found a small steel disc which had crashed through the trees the previous evening. He said that he had intended to alert the army and claim a reward


"Finds Disk, Sure It Came From Sky"
The Chicago Daily News, July 8, 1947, pg. 4
See also: A History of UFO Crashes by Kevin D. Randle
